key_themes: Technical support deterioration across equities and crypto
Institutional crypto adoption and trading infrastructure maturation
Rate policy uncertainty pressuring growth sector margins
Options dealer positioning creating range-bound behavior
Cyclical headwinds versus structural innovation divergence
risk_factors: Cascading liquidations if BTC and QQQ break documented support levels
Guidance revision contagion spreading beyond fintech/software into broader growth sectors
Geopolitical escalation triggering safe-haven flows out of growth equities
SPY breakdown below $670 put wall activating dealer selling pressure
Low retail participation in crypto delaying recovery timeline through mid-2026
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $680 immediate support (5k OI, 0.3% away), $690 resistance (7k OI, 1.2% away). QQQ: $610 put wall support (6k OI, 0.6% away), watch for breakdown or bounce
